website_summaries.verdict: Strong litter pan with removable hood, adaptable to your cat's unique shape and size.
pros: This litter pan is designed to accommodate cats of nearly all sizes, including those with longer bodies
The discreet black flap hides what's inside and helps to contain odors
cons: Some reports of carrying handle not being strong enough to support full litter pan

customer_reviews.title: Poor design makes it hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Our female cat always aims towards the back. She also sprays high sometimes. That is the reason we wanted to switch from a more open litter box to the enclosed style. Unfortunately, the design, as you can see in the picture, leaves a lot to be desired when trying to clean out the clumps. Price seemed OK until it became apparent that you can't clean out the corners.
customer_reviews.author: L. Compton

customer_reviews.title: One flaw. Hope you have lots of disposable chopsticks around....
customer_reviews.text: I would give this box 4.9 stars if not for the crevice that is formed by the "bump out" in the back of the pan. My cat pees in the crack and there is no litter scoop that fits in that small area. Chopstick does. Why would this be in the final design??? One day of testing in a real home with a real cat would have brought this issue up. Everything else about the box is fine. Large size. Removable door, easy to clean, high back. That crevice though....
customer_reviews.author: WillPower

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this litter box. The plastic is nice and thick, and it looks nice. Unfortunately, there's a glaring design flaw: the big indent in the back creates 2 crevices that can't be easily cleaned. With a clumping litter, it fills up and a litter scoop is to big to scrape it out. Also the rounded front is difficult to clean because of the shape as well. UPDATE: The day after I wrote the original review, the lid cracked, under gentle pressure to snap it shut. It hasn't even been in use a month. Reducing to 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Warwizard33

customer_reviews.title: The worst litter box ever it really needs to be redesigned
customer_reviews.text: The worst litter box ever it really needs to be redesigned. The size is great but the very back panel needs to be flat. Cat feces gets caught in between the back panel and the side panel which makes it difficult to clean properly and I clean my litter box twice a day also the door is very flimsy and falls off easily so I took it off
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box, great price!
customer_reviews.text: 1. For those saying this product is cheap, it’s $20 and a great value. If you want an indestructable, high quality litter box, spend more money! 2. This product is an amazing value. It snaps together and comes apart easily for litter changing, but is very sturdy enough to carefully relocate using the handle. I attached the door and swung it around vigorously, seemed very well attached but I ended up taking it off since it confused my cat. I recommend the large size, since cats are generally happier with a litter box more than twice their size. It fits well in my small Seattle apartment. The inside is stick-proof and very easy to clean. Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa Landrud

customer_reviews.title: Listed box length is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: While I like the door design, the usable length of the box is under 20 inches (see attached pic). This is due to an indentation in the bottom tray that appear to be designed to allow for stackability. This indentation robs my cat of almost 4 inches off the stated length. If you are purchasing this box to give your cat some more room, be sure to measure your current box and make sure you are actually getting extra space. Don't trust the listed dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: z3 owner

customer_reviews.title: this is a really bad design, the inside has a part in the ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a really bad design, the inside has a part in the back that faces into the catbox, on the back side, you will have to keep a putty knife on hand to get in to the crevice. the fact that the front is rounded out makes it hard for scooping, as scoopers are normally squared off. I really do not get the part that is indented on the inside, there is absolutely no reason for it, and it makes it really hard to clean out.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa lowenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great liter box!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this litter box. It’s a great color. Sleek enough to have in a living space like mine.. (an apartment in NYC) I love that the flap is black so it hides it pretty well and keeps the smell out. Very easy to put together and very easy to take apart when it’s time to clean! I’ve tried many liter boxes in the past and this definitely is my absolute favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Senior

customer_reviews.title: My cat instantly loved this. We haven't tried it with the door ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat instantly loved this. We haven't tried it with the door down yet, so I will update my review once we try that. Its super easy to assemble and easy to clean with the wide opening (you don't even have to take the top off to clean it out after daily use). I would recommend. UPDATE: we finally tried it with the door down and he still loves his litter box. GREAT design, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya S

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered/bought some cheap pieces of garbage in my life and this has to be in the top five! It is flimsy, the latches do not work and instructions are a waste of time. Would return it but shipping for return but cost prohbitive. By all means buy something else. On another note, if you can teach your drivers to take pictures of where they left the package, would it be possible to teach them how to ring a bell that is right above where the package(s) are dropped.
customer_reviews.author: ripped off

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Basics scores again!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and my big boy fits in this one just fine. Very well made and roomy. And most of all, my big boy likes it; he's 12yo and set in his kitty-cat ways so he has the final sayso and he says, this one is perfect (no purrfect pun...haha). No litter mess on floor, and door is roomy.
customer_reviews.author: H. Sweany

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased (2) of the large, hooded litter boxes (the one without the door). It's similar to one that Nature's Miracle had before they redesigned it (I wasn't happy with the redesigned one!). The AmazonBasics without the door doesn't have a funky shape on the back on the bottom tray like the one with a door does. All 3 cats seem happy with it! Even my cat that is very looong fits in this litter box. I hope Amazon continues to carry this for when I need to purchase more in the future when they need to be replaced. :)
customer_reviews.author: Schatzi35

customer_reviews.title: More of a mess than with open litter boxes
customer_reviews.text: Before this, my cat was using a disposable, open litter box. I thought that was messy but with this, she's somehow making even more of a mess which I didn't think was possible. I'm also seeing more litter being tracked around my apartment so I'm not very happy with this purchase. I'm going to try and pass this on to a friend or relative. It's just way too messy for me to keep and is a lot bigger than I though it would be. The picture shows all the cat litter that has been falling out in just a few days. She's one cat but tons of litter is being transferred outside of the litter box daily.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Large and roomy, but the main flaw is that ...
customer_reviews.text: Large and roomy, but the main flaw is that the base is molded with handholds and such that reflect on the interior of the pan as well. This leaves really large grooves for litter and feces to get stuck in that a scraper just can't remove. It was clearly designed to be used with a pan liner of some kind and should have been noted and maybe supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Jey

customer_reviews.title: Intentional design defect
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great box except for one part of the design makes it the worst litter box I have ever owned. Amazon designed this box well until they decided they needed to make them stackable for manufacturing purposes. There is a large protrusion from the back of the box that forms a crevice which you cant clean with a traditional litter scoop. The ONLY reason this protrusion is here is so these items are stackable in the production facility. No thought was put into this product and a simple in-home test would have shown this glaring defect. Returning both. Sad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: On the small side, my cat peed out the flap. When it's full of litter, you cant pick it up by the handle because it isn't sturdy enough. The rounded edges/contoured side makes it very difficult to keep it clean with a scooper. I guess you get what you pay for. The one plus is that my cat doesn't refuse to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Alissa reeves

customer_reviews.title: Best litter box EVER! Seriously
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is the bomb!! If your cat is a jerk like mine you’ll love this box. My cat likes to kick all his litter out. Not sure why because I clean his box everyday! I was tired of stepping in the litter so I thought I’d give this box a try. Life saver! No more stepping in piles of litter. Actually no litter gets out at all. At first Nathan( the jerk cat) was confused on how to get into the litter box. I dropped him in there a few times and he was golden. I highly recommend this litter box! Easy to open and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Better Than It Works
customer_reviews.text: We want to like this litter box, but after only a few weeks of use, part of the lid split and broke off--a rim that supports the upper portion of the door--and now the door no longer functions properly. The plastic is too thin, too flimsy. Also, it's hard to clean the litter; there's a ridge around the wall of the box that interferes with the scooper.
customer_reviews.author: J. MILLER

customer_reviews.title: Extremely difficult to clean, small, fragile
customer_reviews.text: It's way smaller than I expected, but that's my fault for not checking the measurements. What's NOT my fault is the poor design of the interior. It has all kinds of creases and folds of the plastic that allow the cat pee to get stuck into. It's EXTREMELY difficult to clean. Additionally, my cat broke the door off after 1 week. Whatever he did one night snapped it off at the hinge and the plastics broke
customer_reviews.author: Steven K

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and size
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this cat box! Yes it’s big...my cat is big....and a high pee’r, so I think it’s gonna work out great!! I like the triangular design because I can angle the opening away from my line of sight and it gives him some privacy. Nobody like to be eye to eye when using the loo. But also because there’s no sharp corners for him to pee in. Scooping so far has been easier than a traditional box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Speak

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had a big enough apartment to keep this
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality litter box, the plastic was not flimsy and it was packaged very nicely. However its WAAAAAAAAAY too big for an NYC apartment and it didn't fit in my bathroom. Its much bigger than advertised. If you have the room though, I would say give this litter box a chance
customer_reviews.author: Ll

customer_reviews.title: Litter box is Built strong, very big , super super fast shipping and easy to put 2gether!!
customer_reviews.text: Both Cats already inlove with this litter box, just unopened and they jumped right in as if it was a toy or there house HAVENT HAD A CHANCE TO GET THE NEW LITTER YET AS THIS CAME VERY FAST... THE BOX IS BUILT AS SHOWN VERY BIG ,,STURDY,, & STRONG AS I HAVE 2 BIG CATS ONE 30 POUNDS AN THE OTHER 15 PDS...THEY NEED THE ROOM TO MOVE ABOUT WHILE HANDLING THEIR BUSINESS AND THEY LOVE LUV LUV THE FACT THEY HAVE PRIVACY!!!! Its exactly as pictured an was shipped super fast an recieved in 24 hours which i was shocked....
customer_reviews.author: Heaven

customer_reviews.title: So much better then an open box
customer_reviews.text: Okay this product is so much better then an open litter box. The door swings both ways and after a few times of showing our cat she got the hang of it. The black part opens up more so you can access it and clean it. With the open boxes our cat was throwing litter all over and the odors were released. With this box it traps odors and keeps the litter where it belongs. We put a jumbo cat pad under it to catch any litter on her paws while exiting. Spend the few extra dollars and get this instead of a cheap one, it’s worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: MGarret

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, cat liked it immediately (perhaps she’s modest and liked the door). I love it as I can’t see inside while waking by, and it seems to reduce the cat litter outside of the box. Easy to clean. I hesitated to buy it as I thought my cat would find it too small or constricting, but she truly seems to prefer it over the standard opening variety. We now have two: one for home and one for her beach house. Yes-other cats out there, she has a trust fund.
customer_reviews.author: Redflexyflyer

customer_reviews.title: working well
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting a top-entry litter pan, to keep my small dogs out of the litter. However, the opening size on many of the pans seemed to small to be comfortable for my generously-sized cats. This pan has a split lid, which means I can leave one-half completely open , to create a larger access area. After they have gotten used to it, I may try shutting both sides of the lid, so they have to try to round doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO mess makes my life a bit easier
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our kitten that loves to kick up litter for fun. He doesn't just do his duty like our older cat. Instead, he stays in the litter box after pooping then decides he's gonna party for a few minutes. Maybe this is the equivalent of humans bringing newspapers or cell phones to the toilet (?) Whatever the case, I had to buy something closed and this particlar model got the least bad reviews. My kitty lets himself in, has his party indoors and doesn't leave me with a mess anymore. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Topazamazon

customer_reviews.title: Good, cheap top entry litter box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great top entry litter box. Left it next to her old one for half the day, then got rid of the old one. She took to it just fine. The only issues I have: 1. No litter box liner is gonna fit. I have XL ones and they don't even reach the top. I tape it to the sides and that mostly works. 2. There's a groove on the top where litter collects as the cat jumps out, and when I open the lid it dumps on the floor. Otherwise, it's a good size litter box, half the price than the ones at Petco.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and very roomy. I use plastic litter liners, so I'm not worried about stuff getting caught in the edges in the back. I really like that you can leave the door off completely or just the part that swings down if you want to. This doesn't have clips; it kind of snaps together, but it seems sturdy. The door portion is large enough and shaped so that you don't have to take the whole top off to scoop it out. The only thing I don't like is that the charcoal filter is difficult to get to and a really weird shape, so you can't just buy any filter.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Doc Allen

customer_reviews.title: I have a cat that sprays towards the back. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that sprays towards the back. Try cleaning the area with this litter box. It's almost impossible without taking out the whole thing,
customer_reviews.author: Nomadic PC User

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this litter box
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this litter box.Very well made and roomy. The top half is clipped on to the bottom half very easily and also the clip is easy to take it off. Everything is designed as simple as it should be while maintaining high quality. For this price, it is definitely worthy to have one.
customer_reviews.author: Grease Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Buy a simple open basin
customer_reviews.text: This device, when filled with litter and poo, came open while transporting it to the trash can. Yes, right on the edge of my Turkish carpet. When I checked out the closing latches, they were simple friction devices without negative catches that might hold it. It was used two times and now comes apart without any litter inside. At $20.00, at least the side latches holding the bottom to the top with handle should have been far better engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Jamius

customer_reviews.title: Works better than other boxes
customer_reviews.text: The Good: It sits in the corner of my bathroom and does a better job keeping my litter-spreading cat's mess contained. It's easy to scoop and clean (just pop the top off), and doesn't have any dirt-collecting depressions on the back/sides. I'm happy with it. The Bad: One major design flaw: it doesn't sit perfectly in a corner due to rounded sides. Also, if your cat's messy the side-opening is low enough and big enough that it won't stop them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunbear

customer_reviews.title: The cat smells sticks
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have never had a cat box smell as bad as this one has. I never even knew cat smells could stick to plastic the way it does with this. I owned it for a month and cleaned it every other day, but ended up having to throw it away since the cat urine smell wouldn’t come off of the plastic. Buyers beware you’re in for a stink.
customer_reviews.author: Princess_Zelda

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size, Triangular Shape Creates Issues
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great idea to stash in a corner, but this thing is HUGE, even with top off. Much more noticeable than a more standard rectangular pan shoved in a corner. Triangular shape means much less internal space for litter and cat than seems from size. And forget it if you want to use litter liners.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great litter box!
customer_reviews.text: No more sweeping up litter daily! I have two cats, so I bought one to start with. I wanted to make sure they would use it. We left the flip top open, so they wouldn’t feel so closed in right away. After a day or two, I closed the tops and no problems. I immediately bought a second one and we’re good to go. I love that it keeps the litter in the box, conceals the box contents, and gives the cats privacy. I don’t know why I didn’t get these sooner. Every cat owner should.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Peregoy

customer_reviews.title: Great cat box - especially for chubby cats.
customer_reviews.text: Roomy, wide door, and great for chubby or picky cats. Yes the back area can be tricky. I just sprinkle baking soda back there and have never had any issues (and certainly no need to use chopsticks to break it up like other reviews...). The issue that some people have with the back is because they use cheap/ineffective cat litter. Use this cat box with Dr. Elsey's cat litter, a sprinkle of baking soda and you'll never smell your cat box. Cleaning is a breeze if you use the right stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite litter bix ever
customer_reviews.text: I really love it! I was hesitant at first, becUse ot has some negative reviews, but since I’m not using clumping litter, mostly just silicone, it’s super easy to clean. I like the design a lot, it looks small, but my big kitty have no troubles using it at all. If you’re not using clumping litter, this is a perfect litter box.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Ro

customer_reviews.title: Functional without designer look
customer_reviews.text: This is so far the best litter box we've had after trying a couple of others including the IRIS. The latter matched the apartment interior great, but the oval shape made it difficult to clean and the lack of holes on the lid created a mess of litter clay everywhere. No mess with the Amazon Basics, which has a grill on the lid that our kitten likes to sweep his feet on. The only reason to take a star off is the lack of color choices. I wish I could take half stars off.
customer_reviews.author: Vasi

customer_reviews.title: Less tracking, plus clumping litter doesn't stick to the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Best litter box I've ever had. There are ample homes for the litter to fall thru when the cat gets out, so there's less taking, and the inside altars to be coated with something just a tad slippery so that clumping let doesn't turn to intractable cement after my cat uses it. I've been looking for a tip entry box with appropriately sized, copious holes like this for years. The perfect top entry litter box.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: Don't pay attention to the top reviews
customer_reviews.text: Recently got two cats and realized that an open pan litter box was not going to work for me since one of the cats loves to kick litter out of the tray. Ordered this as a potential replacement. I have been leaving the door open and the cats picked up using it very quickly. Way less litter comes out than an open pan which is what I hoped for. The top reviews are misleading since the litter box has been redesigned not to have that bulge at the end any more so I wouldn't pay attention to those reviews. Product is good and the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: esmat

customer_reviews.title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best litterbox I have ever purchased. It's huge - but accommodates the regular (LARGE) drawstring liners. It will still lock with the liners - unlike three other brands we have tried. The door isn't flimsy and I don't see any harm coming to it. It clicks in beautifully and it will stay but, it will fold back for access by humans. Cat is happy. We are happy. What more could anyone want. THANK YOU, thank you for making a great litter box.
customer_reviews.author: CA native

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: My cat is totally fine with going into the box and it does keep the litter in the container a lot better than an open litter box. It does cut down on the smell as well. HOWEVER, if you keep your litter box anywhere near a bedroom, this litterbox makes the entire process of a cat going to the bathroom so loud! Every noise is amplified and when the litter is kicked around in there it will wake even a heavy sleeper up at night. If you can put the litter box anywhere else in the house then its a great litter box, but if your only option is the bedroom I would not suggest it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Michniewicz

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if your cat aims for the back of the litter box
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this if you cat likes to aim for the back of the litterbox It gets wet and drips down those edges that are impossible to get into to clean the litter sticks and stinks as a result In addition if they get it high enough it gets into the channel along the edge andDon’t buy if your cat names for the back of the litter box you have to wait the channel as well as the hood
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: This is a great thing to have for our cat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great thing to have for our cat. And it is made with great quality. The top half is clipped on to the bottom half very easily and also the clip is easy to take it off. With litter in the box/heavy, the design is sturdy enough for the bottom part to not falling off if you lift the handle up. Everything is designed as simple as it should be while maintaining high quality. For this price, it is definitely worthy to have one.
customer_reviews.author: Nemo and Dory

customer_reviews.title: not a great box.
customer_reviews.text: lots of small areas molded into box that makes cleaning difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: This litter box is great for keeping things contained
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is great for keeping things contained. Our previous traditional litter box let lots of litter out and our cat would pee on the edge and get it on our floor. This design prevents both of those things, it’s also really nice and large.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good for all cats.
customer_reviews.text: Love this litterbox so do my kids. Im changinf back to the hooded kind and my litter area is in a closet under the stairs so the corner type fits perfectly! Only bought to try out but about to buy 1 more! It also fits all my cats. They range in weight from 9lbs-28lbs and are even pretty tall but they love this box. All 5 fight to use it sometimes lol
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Comes with filtered freshness
customer_reviews.text: My kitten isnt ready yet to have the black door on but even with the top on, a lot of litter stays inside. I have a mat as well to step out on and I might have 3 to 5 pieces on litter on the actual floor. I love how this keeps the mess in bc my little guy kicks litter around as well as serena plays tennis.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, much less smelly
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid my cats would be like, "uhm, what is this?" But they started using it immediately! Also, it really holds in the smell so much better than the covered litter boxes I was using. It honestly doesn't make that much sense to me, but it's true! I think my cats like all of the extra litter and space they have in there. I plan on buying a couple more!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Benson

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bunny. The quality is good and the price is decent compared to what you would pay in a pet store for a similar item. I purchased the standard and it's perfect for a small animal to turn around in. I suggest if you're buying this item for a kitten or cat opt. For the large the standard would be too small especially as your kitten grows. Standard is definitely not good for an adult cat as it is too small.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CAT BOX
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS ALMOST PERFECT. ROOMY...EASY ACCESS DOOR...WELL MADE. HOWEVER...FOR SOME CRAZY REASON..AS OTHER POSTERS HAVE NOTED...THERE IS A COUPLE OF INDENTIONS ON THE MOULDING OF BACK SIDE THAT SIMPLY DO NOT NEED TO BE THERE AND CAN MAKE SCOOPING A BIT MORE TROUBLESOME THAN NEED BE TO REMOVE FROM THAT AREA. I USE THE NEW SLIDE LITTER AND THAT HELPS CONSIDERABLY...BUT MANUFACTURER NEEDS TO ADDRESS THAT AND TAKE OUT THE NEEDLESS INDENTIONS IN THE BACK PART OF BOX! THEN IT WOULD BE A 5 STAR RATING...NO DOUBT!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from an open litter box.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps litter from being tracked all over and is large enough to give the cat plenty of scratching room.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Westgate

customer_reviews.title: Works surprisingly well
customer_reviews.text: We started out without the flap, since we've never had litter boxes that had a flap. After a week or so of happy use, we attached the flap. Our female feline had no problem adjusting to it and now the stink after a poop is contained. I like that the size is modest so it takes less kitty litter to build a layer - we use the silica gel type kitty litter and use a doggy bag to pick out the poop.
customer_reviews.author: Flaxman

customer_reviews.title: Great size, well made, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate this litter box as it is large enough and has a lid but doesn't feel monstrous. I am able to fold the door up on top as my cat doesn't like to be closed into it. But the opening is shaped in such a way that I don't feel like I'm always looking right into the litter. And it is easy to clean...no odd corners or nooks and crannies where yucky stuff would get trapped. Top attaches and detaches easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Stinky
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews. I purchased another hooded kitty litter box from Amazon (a different brand) and had it for years with no complaints. It contained scent well and was easy to clean. This product may be easy to clean but does NOT contain scent at all. I have to keep a kitty litter box upstairs and downstairs in my split level home. The "door" does not shut all of the way so it does not contain smells. I would not recommend this product. The "door to return" has closed so I am guessing that we will have to buy another replacement. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: A bit small, if you had a large cat I don't think they would like this one. I love the door and that helps keep the litter in place. Easy to clean, there is a lip along the back that could be hard to clean if it builds up, I clean the box daily and haven't had issues.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: My cats ❤️ It
customer_reviews.text: I really like this a lot. It’s deep and pretty big but not too big! My other Some ones with a top are about To be replaced with a couple more of these! I have four cats and one Of them wasn’t liking going after the new one and started peeing on the carpet by the box. Lucky for him he’s been using the new box. This box is big enough but not too big you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Pike

customer_reviews.title: This is extremely hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: The rounded end makes it hard to clean. Sometimes my cats don't get all the way in, and their excrement goes on the floor. I've waited too long to return it, unfortunately, so I recommend that no one purchase this litter box. It is light, and easily moved. That's the best thing I can about it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This poop box replaced a 6 year old name brand corner box that was still useful but we thought that out furry kids needed a new one. Amazon basics overall is great and this box is well made and will easily last a long time. I also do like the built in handle to help drag it out of where it sits.
customer_reviews.author: Jdlockwood

customer_reviews.title: Top entry box, only appropriate for small cats
customer_reviews.text: Since the description failed to provide the dimensions, I decided to order it to check it out. Unfortunately, it's small. The inner dimensions are approximately 20" L x 13" W x 15" H, which is just too small for my 13lb male cat to use comfortably, especially considering the top entry opening is 8.5". I also worry that the folding lid pieces won't hold up over time. I purchased the Iris top entry and find that to be a better overall design, and a better fit for our household, as it's larger. It works well for our smaller felines, but I'm still on the hunt for a larger top entry for our male cat.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Scoop
customer_reviews.text: This litter box is hard to clean because it is not smooth inside. For some bizarre reason, it has a section at the back that juts out which creates crevices that my scoop doesn't really fit into. It looks good on the outside and it's roomy, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Do Some Research First
customer_reviews.text: My cat was making a huge mess, kicking her litter all over the floor whenever she used her box, so I decided to try this product. I was really excited for her to use it, but apparently some cats refuse to feel confined when doing their business. I tried with and without the door, and even without the lid, but my cat mostly decided to pee and poop on my carpet instead. She stopped immediately when I switched back to my previous shallow and low-walled litter box. I'm sure this is a great product, but I'd experiment and research a bit to find out if your cat will have the same reaction as mine did before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you have a dog!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog would not stay out of the litter box, it was so disgusting but this was the perfect solution. We placed it between the wall and the tv stand and she can't reach her head into the box now. Our cats adapted to it right away and I think they actually like it more. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: The cat's point of view.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great. He had gotten too big for his first one, he didn't like the closed feeling . It was hard to clean. This one is much bigger. He likes the cave like atmosphere and he can hide and "scare" us when he thinks we arr not paying atttention to him. It's a lot of fun to watch. it's easier to clean, he can be a bit privete.
customer_reviews.author: DEE

customer_reviews.title: Litter box
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the door is removable so our kitten had easy access before learning to use the door. It does keep the oders out (or maybe it's the litter) either way it is easy to take the top off for cleaning. Only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is the door stays slightly open, it looks like in the mold of the box there may have been a magnet to hold the door in a closed position which was either never installed or the design was flawed and didn't work. Either way for the price it can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H

customer_reviews.title: Get the triangle box!
customer_reviews.text: The triangle is remarkably big! The sides are at least 6 inches high, so high enough that even a big kitty can't pee over the edge. We have it in the corner of our bathroom. I like that the diagonal gives us some space so we're not crowded, and it looks like it would be roomy for kitty inside. The top is light so cleaning is easy. Had it a month and every one is pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Great litterbox!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. It has a tall back and the door can be used, or if your cats are not familiar with it, it doesnt have to be used, and it can be holded on top of ththe box. Id buy again!
customer_reviews.author: sglo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! We have quite the collection of cats lately, we have 5 at the moment. 4 are strays who have adopted us 😐 this box is perfect! We have the flap flipped up (it flips up, you do not need to remove it if you don't plan to use it) until the cats get used to using it. Then I'll lower the flap. It's fixed the mess that's left on my floor! The litter stays in the box, imagine that!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clear

customer_reviews.title: The design of the box makes it harder for them to have their urin leak out on the floors! Awfully thin on the bottom.  Good job!
customer_reviews.text: What did I like the most?? I have 2 male cats .... and they're quite young yet and 1 older one, they're all indoor cats boys will be boys lol so they try to see who can reach the highest spot in the litter box Your litter box is the first of its KIND lol it doesn't leak out the sides!!!! Although I STILL keep rubber matts underneath it. I absolutely love these litter boxes! I've been a cat mom for 30 years. I'd rather have to try harder to clean the box than to clean the floor underneath the box! Once again great job on the design of the the box!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: This box saved my marriage!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this litter box!!! I took the “gate” off because it was intimidating our kitten, this has to be one of the best litter boxes (hooded or not) I have used. It keeps smells within the box and it is easy to scoop out (the top part opens so it is easy to scoop)...... I highly recommend this litter box!!!! This box saved my marriage from divorce...... LOL Just kidding but my husband is happy that he can go into the laundry room 1) Not step on litter that our little one likes to kick out 2) The biggie it contains the smell!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: LynLyn

customer_reviews.title: Large litter box
customer_reviews.text: I recently had gotten 2 new kittens and I had an older cat. Kittens like to throw litter around so I wanted a covered box. This is a nice box, a lot larger than I had thought it would be. It works well with all the cats and the kittens can use it in tandem. It is bulky and due to my physical limitations is more difficult than a flat square one but the benefits of the cover outweigh the difficulty due to size. I would recommend this for a multi-cat family.
customer_reviews.author: Jannette and Anthony Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Simba Sized Litter Box
customer_reviews.text: Bruuuuuhhhhhhh.... this thing is GINORMOUS... I typed in ‘kitten litter box’ and this popped up... Maybe they thought I meant Lion Cub...but I didn’t see dimensions..and now... just... DON’T. And to return it costs the price of it... so guess what? My kid has a new fort. THAT’s how HUGE it is... smh.. It’s sturdy and easy to clean up toddler crackers... sooooo three stars! (See pic for actual two year old with kitten in background)
customer_reviews.author: Tailored To Bare

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a large car
customer_reviews.text: We have a very big cat. He has always hated covered litter boxes because he was too big to turn around. Had to keep trying though because he is a very messy litter spreader. This one was the perfect size. The corner shape make it perfect for turning in and so much less litter mess
customer_reviews.author: Kim Moser

customer_reviews.title: What a lifesaver...
customer_reviews.text: Before we purchased the Amazon Basic Litter Box, I was not sure I was pleased my daughter had given me a cat--despite how much I adore her. The smell in my small apartment, even when cleaned every day, was intolerable Now, my house smells clean and fresh just the way it did before my princess kitty, Cleo, joined the family. I don't regret keeping either of them now!.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Fae

customer_reviews.title: Check point for human servants
customer_reviews.text: We've had this litter box about 30 days. It has become the litter box of choice of all 3 cats. It is roomy enough that our big, fat fluff balls have room to move and turn around repeatedly. The lazy girl who always pees over the side of the box can no longer miss. And my fat, little demon who wants to dig her way back to hell can no longer flip kitty litter outside of the box. So far the box has been fantastic... No smells, no mess.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Annoying to take the lid off to clean
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product works well. I did have a litter box with no lid and my cat started missing and peeing on the floor, so this new litter box has solved that problem. However, you do have to take the lid off completely to clean it properly and the little lip inside makes it a little difficult. It works for its intended purpose, but could be designed a little better for the person.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Meowgi

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it but there are a few design cons
customer_reviews.text: I got the large one and it is a great size for my 2 big kitties. I also love that you can pull up the flap for easy scooping. My only issue is with the shape of the box. It's a bit difficult to scoop the litter with the front of it being round. There are also 2 thin recesses in the back of it that you cannot get to with a regular sized scooper so if any wet litter gets in that area, it is very hard to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Epsikk

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together and my cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and my cat loves it. The flap is removable so my cat was able to get used to the new enclosed box before putting it back on. It also helps contain the smell, and the excess litter off of his paws. Definitely would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: LRB

customer_reviews.title: Much cleaner floor
customer_reviews.text: I've waited over a month to give my review. At least 80% less litter on the floor. My cat is over 15 pounds and the top holds him just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put in the back of a van for our cross USA move from San Diego to Miami. The size is great for our large lanky 15lb cat, ample space for him to turn around to dig and burry. Two star deduction because the lid does not lock in place. The top can easily be knocked off with the slightest of pressure, if you have a curious dog, skip this one. Also, the handle on top is basically just for removing the lid and not for carrying/moving. This was very disappointing for the move.
customer_reviews.author: Ga4rd2en0er

customer_reviews.title: LARGE. Both cats are using them.
customer_reviews.text: I moved into a smaller place, and got these corner litter boxes to take up less space. Both cats are happily using them. No problems with anything being kicked out, no leaking, nothing. I use a long-handled scoop to clean them out and it does just fine. They are larger than I anticipated, but that's ok, one of my cats is large, so he's happy. I ordered 3, only been using 2; will use the 3rd one in the screened-in porch/cattio soon as I get it completed.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi BB

customer_reviews.title: Good Size & Design / Questionable Longevity
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of the large size for three cats. Rule of thumb is each cat should have one litter box and you should have one extra. Good size BUT one of the snaps that attaches the top to the bottom has cracked. Time will tell on the plastic longevity, appearing to get brittle with time/use.
customer_reviews.author: Caddy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Top Entry - Great for catching litter but wish it were larger
customer_reviews.text: I love this litter box! It's easy to clean, sturdy, and keeps most of the litter from tracking. My cats like to launch themselves out of it at top speed, so some still does scatter, but I don't fault Amazon for not taking rocket cats into consideration. The only thing is that I wish it were a bit larger or had more size options. I have big cats, so normal litter boxes are way too small. The height is perfect, but they're still bit cramped, width-wise. If they had an XL top entry option, I would definitely take it.
customer_reviews.author: Mnemosyne

customer_reviews.title: HARD TO CLEAN
customer_reviews.text: The back of the box has a crease inside, (due to the un-necessary design), which, if you have a male cat who pees standing up gets peed on, and then covered with litter. This crease, which is a 7 or so inches verticlly and is 3/4 inch or so both wide and deep. The pee mixed with the litter gets stuck like mud in this gully, and makes it a nightmare to clean. If you have a female cat, you would probably think this box is fine, as it is well built, and large. I am thinking about returning it, as this has become very unpleasant, once or twice a day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size box
customer_reviews.text: We have a almost 20lb LARGE cat, not over weight, but a large cat. This box was meant for her and she fits pretty well in it
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Who thought a round base was a good idea?
customer_reviews.text: Litter boxes should not have curved bases. It makes scooping up cat waste very tricky when the scoops are square-like. The waste looks like it's about to get scooped up but then falls between that nice area between the scoop and the curved freakin' corner. Plus, don't get me started on the small grooves in the back of the tray that likes to let the little pieces completely hide from your scoop. I have to shuffle the waste around to the front and then awkwardly scoop it up on an angle so I can collect it properly.
customer_reviews.author: Shmoo

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: My cat, for lack of a better word, is a slob, and litter being scattered all over the room was always an issue. This box has corrected that issue, no more litter outside the box and on the floor. I am going to purchase another for a different room. I was a little concerned about whether he would climb through the hole in the top, and it did take a few days for him to finally figure it out. He now has no issues. The only issue, is being that the box is much deeper than the typical litter box, it take a little bit more effort to scoop it out, but the benefits far outweigh this minor inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: joshua

customer_reviews.title: Bit cumbersome, but effective for multicat households
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy 55 gallon trash bags from Home Depot to have a liner. I place lower half of box in bag and turn inside out when changing. Younger cats were trying to chase my 16 year old cat off all 4 litter boxes because she has strong urine smell (kidneys are going). I placed her in front of this one and it became hers. It is deep enough to cover her smell and I can go over a week without having to change it. Everyone is happy!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful box. It was a little bigger than expected, but the cats have no problem using it. They switched seamlessly. I love that it contains the litter they like to kick around, and that it controls the odor. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brittainy

customer_reviews.title: No FAT Cats!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality plastic, thick like plastic tote storage boxes, and a 39 GALLON garbage bag fit it perfectly; since the litter box liners made for these are total junk, thin, and to much $. However, if you have a cat 12 lbs or more, like mine, they will not want to jump on the grate as it slightly dips inward. Not on the way in nor out, will they use it; that really defeats its purpose, since I did NOT want a great deal of litter scattered all over the place and floor! Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I like it; I don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cat box alot. The front lip is low and i have a problem cat that doesn't squat enough so she always pees on the seam and it comes out. It is very hard to clean the rounded edges in the back. The are indentations in the corners and scoops don't fit in there. The flap comes on and off very easily which doesn't really matter except when you are cleaning it and it falls off all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Dog can't get into it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this litter box because our dog likes to eat cat poop. The other boxes we have are behind baby gates so she can't get to it, but we needed another one. The top entry makes it so our dog can't get into it and eat the litter/poop. Our cats caught onto the top entry very quickly. We even have some pretty hefty cats and they used the box comfortably. Also haven't noticed litter outside the box, so that's nice!
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Very very good with containg the pet odors as my cat has ...
customer_reviews.text: Very very good with containg the pet odors as my cat has decided that he no longer wanted to cover up his 'Little surprises" anymore. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Satin Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Great product, you should probably buy it if you're on the fence
customer_reviews.text: This hooded cat litter box is amazing! Retains a majority of the smell from our cats as they do their business. Previously had another product that was not as good as this one. Can hold a lot of cat litter and has a handle on top for transporting, conveniently. The lid pops off for easy cleaning and clicks right back into place. Never loose and never easy to get on.The flap is a little hard to put on initially, but after it is in place, there is no need to remove it. I would buy this again and strongly recommend to purchasers. P.s. On hot/warm days my cats decide to sleep inside the litter box... Weird cats I guess?
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: not for heavier cats
customer_reviews.text: I have a chunky cat (but not morbidly obese) and I had the original top entry litter box that came out many many years ago. i thought i’d try this one. compared to the original, the amazon version does not hold as strong. there have been a few times my cat will come out and stand on the edge and tip it completely over. it could be better with heavier material and a stronger top.
customer_reviews.author: anne march

customer_reviews.title: TRIANGLE
customer_reviews.text: I bought the triangle version, my cat is getting too old to use his top entry box. This box is huge! He is much more comfortable now. Very easy to clean as well. If you have a large cat, he will love this box.
customer_reviews.author: DEVI'S MOM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent litter box
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this box. I'm enjoying the fact that it's much harder for my cat to get the litter out of the litter box. My floor are much cleaner now. I'm actually planning on buying at least 1 more of these for my house.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this box! I have a bigger cat who hated using the standard rectangle boxes, and if there was no top on it, I couldn't get her to actually go inside the box. This triangle one is spacious enough for her to comfortably fit, and since getting it, there haven't been any issues with her trying to go outside the box! It can be a little harder than a standard box to clean, around the curves, but it isn't to difficult, and I make due just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rianne

customer_reviews.title: One of the Largest Litterboxes
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these litter boxes for our animal sanctuary. Since we have many, many cats and some that are pretty large, we look for the largest litter boxes we can find. This is one of the largest we've come across. The color is a nice, neutral beige. Our oldest cats (18 years) are able to get in and out of it easily. It has been very easy to clean, with no sticking. The only minor issue we've had is that when a cat jumps on top of the list, the carbon filter falls off, and in to the litter. We don't generally bother with filters, so it's not an issue for us.
customer_reviews.author: housefulofpets

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Said Yes to This!
customer_reviews.text: Time for a new liter box in our new home. Kind of makes me nervous to change from old familiar things. My 9 pound cat actually preferred this, lid and all, in a side by side trial with the old one. We never used a lid before, so I took the door off. She seems to like the privacy but the opening makes in and out easy for her. There is noticeable scent. Super easy to clean. Lid comes off easy and goes back on with a click. Handle makes it easy to move. Liter stays mostly inside except what comes out on her toes. Good choice & great price — we are both happy!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics No-Mess Hooded Cat Litter Box (Various Sizes)
feature_bullets: Regular cat-litter box with snap-on hood for added privacy and to help contain litter inside the pan
Plastic swinging door provides easy in/out access for your cat; hood lifts off for easy cleaning
Made of stain and odor resistant polypropylene plastic; wipes clean with a damp cloth

Replaceable carbon filter traps 1 carbon filter has been installed on the product,the replaceable filter need to be purchased separately and reduces litter-box odors; top handle for comfortable carrying
Measures 20.6 by 15.6 by 15 inches LxWxH; door opening measures 7 by 7.5 inches WxH; backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
